titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide competitive civil service status for National Guard technicians who are involuntarily separated other than for cause from National Guard service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

bill.summary: 7/20/2000--Introduced. Amends provisions governing awarding competitive civil service status to national guard technicians who are involuntarily separated from service by eliminating the requirements that such a person: (1) served as a technician for at least three years; and (2) passes a suitable noncompetitive examination.
